alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Otero and north central Las Animas Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 557 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Thatcher, or 34 miles southwest of La Junta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Otero and north central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
